Key: Bam!
GAAH!
Hahaha. Wake up, Onii-chan. Ole, ole!
S-Stop it, Kotori!

Then, wake up already. Are you sleeping so
much because you've still got a virus?
Translation:
Entonces, despierta ya. ¿Estás durmiendo
tanto porque todavía tienes un virus?

Key:
N-No. It passed, so I'll get up. Would you
please get off me first?
Translation:
N-No. Pasó, así que me levantaré.
¿Podrías bajarte de mí primero?

Key:
Then, wake up! Hahaha! Consider this a courtesy
from your adorable sister!
Translation:
Entonces, ¡despierta! ¡Jajaja! ¡Considera esto 
una cortesía de tu adorable hermana!

Key: Gah. S-Stop. I'll wake up! I'll wake up!
*pant, pant*... K-Kotori.
What is it, dearest Onii-chan?
A-About yesterday...
Yesterday? Oh, dinner was fantastic!
No, not that. Yesterday afternoon.
Translation: No, eso no. Ayer por la tarde.

Key: Huh?
Are you still playing dumb? Hey.

All right. Now that you're up, it's time for me
to retreat.
Translation:
De acuerdo. Ahora que te has levantado,
es hora de que me retire.

Key: Hey!
Good-bye, Onii-chan!
Kotori. She's still... acting like that?

(Not that it's a bad thing, but I can't talk to
her while she's like that. Unless I want
trouble.)
Translation:
(No es que sea algo malo, pero no puedo
hablar con ella mientras esté así.
A menos que quiera problemas).

Key: Kotori, what's gotten into you?
Oh, Kotori.
Hm? What is it, Onii-chan?

(...?! She's changed. Even with her white
ribbons, I guess deep down, she's still worried.)
Translation:
(...?! Ha cambiado. Incluso con sus lazos blancos,
supongo que en el fondo sigue preocupada).

Key:
Um, how do I put this? Don't you have to be
onboard the Fraxinus today?
Translation:
¿Cómo digo esto? ¿No tienes que
estar a bordo del Fraxinus hoy?

Key: It's totally fine. It'll function without me.
Translation: Está totalmente bien. Funcionará sin mí.

Key: G-Got it.
Anyways, where's lunch?
Translation: De todos modos, ¿dónde esta el almuerzo?

Key: Oh. I'll prepare it now.
Hey, Kotori.
Oh, Onii-chan. What's up?

Oh. I was wondering how the investigation for
the strange events was going.
Translation:
Oh. Me preguntaba cómo iba la investigación
de los extraños sucesos.

Key: Strange events...?

Y-Yeah. Remember? All the stuff going on
with Tengu City?
Translation:
S-Sí. ¿Te acuerdas? ¿Todo el
asunto de Ciudad Tengu?

Key: Not a clue.
Huh?
That's better left to the adults.
Translation: Eso es mejor dejárselo a los adultos.

Key: But you have a responsibility...
I said it's fine!

Hey, Kotori. Stop dismissing me. Listen. I'm
serious.
Translation:
Oye, Kotori. Deja de ignorarme.
Escucha. Te lo digo en serio.

Key: When am I not serious?
Kotori...
Thanks for the meal!
No problem.
(Kotori was like this all day.)

(I mean, Kotori's always been lackadaisical,
but ever since she became Commander of the
Fraxinus, she was serious, or rather, strict.)
Translation:
(Es decir, Kotori siempre ha sido displicente, pero
desde que se convirtió en comandante del Fraxinus,
se puso seria, o mejor dicho, estricta).

Key:
(But I know for certain something's off with
her. I can't let it go.)
Translation:
(Pero sé con certeza que algo anda
mal con ella. No puedo dejarlo pasar).

Key: (The only way to fix this is to talk about it.)
Translation: (La única forma de solucionarlo es hablar de ello).

Key: Hey, Kotori.
Yes?
Want to go on a date?
Hm? What's the matter?
Nothing!
Okay, then let's go on a date.
I have plans today...
This late at night? What are they?
Translation: ¿A estas horas de la noche? ¿Qué es?

Key: L-Level up in my game.
Translation: Subir de nivel en mi juego.

Key: Then you have free time.
Hey, listen to me!
I am. You were going to grind, weren't you?
Kotori, what's more important, me or gaming?
Translation: Kotori, ¿qué es más importante, yo o el juego?

Key: W-Well...

I want to go on a date with you, Kotori. Come
on. Let's go.
Translation:
Quiero tener una cita contigo, Kotori.
Venga, vamos. Vámonos.

Key: Mm...

Don't pout. You must really not want to
go on a date with me.
Translation:
No hagas pucheros. Realmente no
debes querer tener una cita conmigo.

Key:
(Ugh. Saying it to my face kind of hurts,
but I'm not going to give up!)
Translation:
(Me duele decírmelo a la cara,
pero no voy a rendirme).

Key: Come on, Kotori. Let's hold hands.
Translation: Vamos, Kotori. Tomémonos de las manos.

Key: I refuse!

I don't care what you think. I want to hold
your hand.
Translation:
No me importa lo que pienses.
Quiero cogerte de la mano.

Key: *whimper*...
What? Feeling shy?
No one's watching. It's fine.
It's not that, you see.
Then, what is it?
Man...

You've been acting weird since last night. All of
a sudden, you've got white ribbons and you
don't care about anything. This isn't like you.
Translation:
Has estado actuando raro desde anoche.
De repente, tienes lazos blancos y no te
importa nada. Tú no eres así.

Key:
Hey. Did I do something? If I did, let me
apologize so we can talk it out.
Translation:
Hey. ¿He hecho algo? Si lo hice, déjame
disculparme para que podamos hablarlo.

Key: Kotori, are you listening?
NO! I don't want to listen!
Kotori...

Understood. You don't have to listen to me,
you can stand there. I'll talk to myself, so
don't pay me any attention.
Translation:
Entendido. No tienes que escucharme,
puedes quedarte ahí. Hablaré solo,
así que no me prestes atención.

Key: Hey. What am I to you?

Annoying? Good for nothing? Or do you ever
depend on me at all?
Translation:
¿Molesto? ¿Bueno para nada?
¿O alguna vez dependes de mí?

Key:
If you do, I'm happy to hear it, but you don't,
do you? Haha...
Translation:
Si es así, me alegra oírlo,
pero no es así, ¿verdad? Jaja...

Key: To me, Kotori, you're amazing.

Of course, you're my adorable sister, but our
connection doesn't end there.
Translation:
Por supuesto, eres mi adorable hermana,
pero nuestra conexión no acaba ahí.

Key: You're responsible and trustworthy.
Translation: Eres responsable y digna de confianza.

Key: But I can't rely on you all the time, can I?
Translation: Pero no puedo confiar en ti todo el tiempo, ¿verdad?

Key: I've been putting a lot on your plate recently.
Translation: Últimamente te he puesto muchas cosas en el plato.

Key: From now on, I want to return the favor.
Translation: A partir de ahora, quiero devolver el favor.

Key:
If something hurts you, I want to help you
get through it.
Translation: Si algo te duele, quiero ayudarte a superarlo.

Key:
If you want to cry, I'll cry with you. If you
want to run away, I'll run with you.
Translation:
Si quieres llorar, lloraré contigo.
Si quieres huir, correré contigo.

Key: Onii-chan...
So Kotori, don't leave me, okay?
Translation: Así que Kotori, no me dejes, ¿vale?

Key:
You're still my sister, but there's another side
of you... that is special.
Translation:
Sigues siendo mi hermana, pero hay
otro lado de ti... que es especial.

Key: Shi...do...

It's restrictive, isn't it? Being siblings.
There's nothing we can do to change
that dynamic.
Translation:
Es restrictivo, ¿no? Ser hermanos.
No hay nada que podamos hacer
para cambiar esa dinámica.

Key:
Regardless, that's more of a reason to keep
each other close, don't you think?
Translation:
En cualquier caso, es una razón más
para mantenernos cerca, ¿no crees?

Key: Kotori, is there anyone who could replace me?
Of course... there isn't.

No one could ever replace you either,
Kotori.

It was never supposed to be this way. It wasn't...
It's all your fault, Shido.
Translation:
Nunca debió ser así. No fue…
Todo es culpa tuya, Shido.

Key: Kotori...
Finally, you're being honest with me.
It's all your fault, Shido.

I... I got my hopes up. I didn't consider my
position. I thought it was better that way.
Translation:
M... Me hice ilusiones. No consideré mi posición.
Pensé que era mejor así.

Key:
Instead of being... siblings, I thought we could
be something else.
Translation:
En vez de ser... hermanos, pensé
que podríamos ser algo más.

Key: Kotori...

But that's not the case for you, is it Shido?
All I can be is your little sister.
Translation:
Pero ese no es tu caso, ¿verdad Shido? Todo
lo que puedo ser es tu hermana pequeña.

Key:
Shido, you don't want our current relationship
to change, right? But as your little sister, I can
always be with you...
Translation:
Shido, no quieres que nuestra relación actual cambie,
¿verdad? Pero como tu hermana pequeña,
siempre puedo estar contigo...

Key: That's why... you were acting this way.
Yeah...

Well, there's that, but I really didn't know
what to do anymore.
Translation:
Bueno, ahí queda eso, pero la verdad
es que ya no sabía qué hacer.

Key: Me being strong...

(I must have led her on, but in doing so I broke
down the wall Kotori fought desperately to hold
up. This was the end result.)
Translation:
(Debí de incitarla, pero al hacerlo derribé el muro
que Kotori luchaba desesperadamente por sostener.
Este fue el resultado final).

Key: Sorry, Kotori. For giving you the wrong idea.
Translation: Lo siento, Kotori. Por darte una idea equivocada.

Key: Huh?
Um. Honestly, I see you as... my little sister.
Translation: Um. Honestamente, te veo como... mi hermana pequeña.

Key: My adorable little sister.
Jeez. Don't say it to me twice.
Translation: Cielos. No me lo digas dos veces.

Key: But you are dear to me, Kotori.

Even if you're not my blood sister, whatever
you do, even if you become a Spirit...
Translation:
Aunque no seas mi hermana de sangre, hagas lo
que hagas, aunque te conviertas en Espíritu...

Key: I will never leave you. I won't deny you.
Translation: Nunca te abandonaré. No te negaré.

Key: That's a lie, because last night...

Well, it took me by surprise. You did that stuff
out of the blue.
Translation:
Me tomó por sorpresa.
Hiciste eso de la nada.

Key:
Because... I wanted to take the next step with
you, Shido.
Translation:
Porque... Quería dar el siguiente
paso contigo, Shido.

Key:
I don't know if we can have the relationship
you want.
Translation: No sé si podremos tener la relación que quieres.

Key: Mm...

But I'll always be by your side. That won't
ever change. No matter what relationship
we have. I promise.
Translation:
Pero siempre estaré a tu lado. Eso no cambiará nunca.
No importa la relación que tengamos.
Te lo prometo.

Key:
What others say doesn't matter. We decide
how things go for ourselves.
Translation:
Lo que digan los demás no importa. Nosotros
mismos decidimos cómo van las cosas.

Key:
So, Kotori, let's live together forever. The
two of us will figure it out, one day at a time.
Translation:
Entonces, Kotori, vivamos juntos para siempre.
Los dos lo resolveremos, un día a la vez.

Key: Okay.
All right. It's settled.
Is that what you really want, Shido?
Translation: ¿Es eso lo que realmente quieres, Shido?

Key: Huh?

If our relationship changes, it might hurt.
Who knows what the others think of us.
Translation:
Si nuestra relación cambia, podría doler.
Quién sabe lo que los demás piensan de nosotros.

Key:
I couldn't bear the thought of you being
ashamed.
Translation: No podía soportar la idea de que te avergonzaras.

Key:
I'm fine. It's kinda cool to say that and
have it be true. If someone were to say
something, I can't say it wouldn't affect me.
Translation:
Estoy bien. Es bastante genial decir eso y que
sea verdad. Si alguien dijera algo, no puedo
decir que no me afectaría.

Key:
But it happens, and we can fight it. We always
have and always will... That's who we are.
Translation:
Pero ocurre, y podemos luchar contra ello. Siempre lo
hemos hecho y siempre lo haremos... Eso es lo que somos.

Key: I'm ready to go to war. As long as it's for you.
Translation: Estoy listo para ir a la guerra. Siempre y cuando sea por ti.

Key:
I can fight for you too, Shido. You're the most
special person in the world to me.
Translation:
Yo también puedo luchar por ti, Shido. Eres la
persona más especial del mundo para mí.

Key:
Me too. Kotori, you're so important to me.
In both your white and black forms. I love
you, Kotori.
Translation:
Yo también. Kotori, eres tan importante para mí.
Tanto en tu forma blanca como en la negra.
Te quiero, Kotori.

Key: Shido!
Do you feel better now?
What...?
This isn't enough. More...
Man...
How's this?
Tighter.
I won't... let you go.
Okay...
Shido...?
Oh, sorry. Someone's calling. Reine...?

Oh, I turned my transmitter off. I wonder...
if something happened.
Translation:
Oh, apagué mi transmisor.
Me pregunto... si pasó algo.

Key: I don't know.

(Something feels strange. Like a haze or unease
in the back of my mind. Is it a premonition?)
Translation:
(Siento algo extraño. Como una neblina o inquietud
en el fondo de mi mente. ¿Es una premonición?)

Key: Please, I want you to promise me. That you'll\nthink only of Kotori-chan. Otherwise, your\nheart will one day distance itself from her.
Translation:
Por favor, quiero que me prometas. Que sólo
pensarás en Kotori-chan. De lo contrario, tu
corazón algún día se distanciará de ella.

Key:
(All of a sudden, what Rinne said came back to
me. Kotori and I were connecting here. This is
a moment to savor.)
Translation:
(De repente, lo que dijo Rinne volvió a mí.
Kotori y yo estábamos conectando aquí.
Este es un momento para saborear).

Key:
(I don't want... this to change.
Kotori is irreplaceable, and I want to
prioritize my time with her now.)
Translation:
(No quiero... que esto cambie.  Kotori es irremplazable,
y quiero priorizar mi tiempo con ella ahora).

Key:
(I could call Reine back. It might be serious,
but if I answer the phone, I'll miss out on this
precious moment.)
Translation:
(Podría volver a llamar a Reine. Podría ser grave,
pero si contesto al teléfono, me perderé
este precioso momento).

Key:
(I got a bad feeling. Where is this anxiety
coming from?)
Translation:
(Tengo un mal presentimiento.
¿De dónde viene esta ansiedad?)

Key: Shido, are you sure?
Y-Yeah...

(That's right. I already know what I'm going
to do. I'm going to...)
Translation: (Así es. Ya sé lo que voy a hacer. Voy a...)

Key: Answer.
Don't answer.
